metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10898 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in openstack-tripleo-heat-templates before version 8.0.2-40. When deployed using Director using default configuration, Opendaylight in RHOSP13 is configured with easily guessable default credentials.

criterions.comment: tripleo-heat-templates: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
